files.patch:
@@ -120,1 +120,13 @@
-          sudo apt install gcc-${{ inputs.gcc-major-version }}${{ inputs.gcc-package-suffix }} g++-${{ inputs.gcc-major-version }}${{ inputs.gcc-package-suffix }} libxrandr-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} libxtst-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} libcups2-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} libasound2-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} ${{ inputs.apt-extra-packages }}
+          sudo apt install \
+            gcc-${{ inputs.gcc-major-version }}${{ inputs.gcc-package-suffix }} \
+            g++-${{ inputs.gcc-major-version }}${{ inputs.gcc-package-suffix }} \
+            libcups2-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libasound2-dev${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libfontconfig1-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libx11-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libxext-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libxrender-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libxrandr-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libxtst-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            libxt-dev:${{ steps.arch.outputs.suffix }} \
+            ${{ inputs.apt-extra-packages }}
@@ -122,7 +134,0 @@
-          sudo apt install libfontconfig1-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-            libx11-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-            libxext-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-            libxrender-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-            libxrandr-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-            libxtst-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }} \
-            libxt-dev:${{ inputs.apt-architecture }}
